Module ucd.javafx.game_fx
Package service

Class GameEssentials

java.lang.Object
service.GameEssentials
public class GameEssentials extends Object
Service for all the game essential elements like initializing, checking winners, displaying scoreboards

      public GameBoard initBoard(int width, int height, int playerCount)
      Method for initiaizing gameboard , a starting point of the game
      Parameters:
      width - Represents no of rows on gameboard
      height - Represents no of columns on gameboard
      playerCount - Represents no of players playing the game
      Returns:
      gameboard instance

    • checkObstacles

      public boolean checkObstacles(GamePlay gamePlay, String direction)
      Method to check if obstacle is in the particular direction
      Parameters:
      gamePlay - Represents the curent active game
      direction - Represents the direction rolled / selected by the player
      Returns:
      true if there is an obstacle on the destination of the player
